content.rendered: Sanjaya joined Regent Group in 2008 as a graphic designer after completing his degree in Multimedia Computing with Video Production at the University of West London. After return to his home country of Sri Lanka, Sanjaya continued to work remotely with Regent Group as a Graphic and Web Designer. Currently Sanjaya is managing the Colombo office operations of the Regent Group.
